name: Don't Litter!
description:
Help! The park has been trashed by many people who litter! Yuck! Collect all 10 trash items to save the park from pollution! And remember, don't litter in real life! Put garbage in the can because it can not only help the people who clean it up, but it can help you and the earth to stop the never-ending effects of pollution.

                                                                                                                                                                                                 

Items to collect:

Toilet Paper, Water Bottle (x2), Wood, Battery, Glass bottle (x2), Brick, Cereal Box, Plastic Cup. These are 10 items that need to be collected to win the game.

                                                                                                                                                                                              

CONTROLS:

WASD or Arrow Keys to move (WASD recommended)

Mouse - Move Camera

ESC - Show Mouse, Triple tap to end game.

Walk into the items to collect them.

                                                                                                                                                                                                 

Work in progress, will add a "You Won!" screen and a counter in the future. Sorry for the current inconvenience. 

Thanks for Playing!

V. 0.1.0
